"What's the point of Litecoin?"  1) back-up utility in case BTC is attacked that uses the same stack 2) excess capacity routing heat-sink 3) "Bitcoin's testnet" 4) Scrypt's higher $/%-hashpower curve to climb, 10B 51% budget on BTC is cheaper on LTC, but hashpower-adjusted, more.
